name: Nigiri
description: Nigiri sushi consists of a small hand-pressed mound of rice topped with a slice of raw fish or seafood.

name: Sashimi
description: Sashimi is thinly sliced raw seafood served without rice. It emphasizes the quality and freshness of the fish.

name: Maki
description: Maki sushi is made by rolling rice and various ingredients, such as fish, vegetables, and seaweed, into a cylindrical shape.

name: Temaki
description: Temaki sushi, also known as hand roll sushi, is a cone-shaped sushi roll wrapped in seaweed and filled with various ingredients.

name: Uramaki
description: Uramaki, or inside-out roll, is a type of sushi where the rice is on the outside and the seaweed wraps around the fillings.

name: Futomaki
description: Futomaki sushi is a thick roll that contains a variety of ingredients, often including multiple types of fish and vegetables.

name: Chirashi
description: Chirashi sushi is a bowl of sushi rice topped with a variety of sashimi, vegetables, and other ingredients.

name: Inari
description: Inarizushi consists of seasoned sushi rice stuffed into a pouch of seasoned and slightly sweetened fried tofu.
